attributes.action: pike conservation on dcal waters lough erne
attributes.additional_details:
pike conservation on dcal waters
Department for Culture, Media and Sport
ask the government to investigate the legal netting licences issued by Dcal northern Ireland of course fish namely (Pike Esox lucius) and sustainability of these fishes on Lough Erne Northern Ireland , and also to investigate loss of revenue gained from angling tourism and local business from over fishing the Lough, creating a dead lough that will no longer support any natural resources.
